sentence.Network_en: The letter showed horribly clearly the workings of a twisted mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 那封信非常清楚地表明了一个变态者的思维方式。

sentence.Network_en: Neural networks are computer systems which mimic the workings of the brain.
sentence.Network_cn: 神经网络是模拟大脑工作方式的计算机系统。

sentence.Network_en: The bill would give people the right to much more information about the workings of government.
sentence.Network_cn: 该法案将赋予人们了解更多有关政府运作方面信息的权利。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以w开头的英语英文单词 ... workday 工作日 workings 活动方式 workmanship 手艺,技巧.
新概念英语第四册笔记41-60课_张娟_新浪博客 ... supernatural a. 超自然的 workings 运作（可数名词） worthy of 值得.

The greenhouse effect has been part of the earths workings since its earliest days ., 从最早期开始 , 温室效应一直是地球运转方式的一部分.

entry.def: Working people have jobs which they are paid to do.

example.ex: Like working women anywhere, Asian women are buying convenience foods.
example.tran: 像其他地方的职业女性一样，亚洲女性也购买方便食品。

entry.def: Working people are ordinary people who do not have professional or very highly paid jobs.

example.ex: The needs and opinions of ordinary working people were ignored...
example.tran: 普通劳动者的需求和意见遭到忽视。

example.ex: One or two, in blue suits, might have been bank officials. Others were clearly working men.
example.tran: 有一两个穿蓝色西装的人可能是银行职员，其他的显然都是普通工人。

entry.tran: 上班时间的;工作时间的
entry.def: A working day or week is the amount of time during a normal day or week which you spend doing your job.

example.ex: For doctors the working day often has no end...
example.tran: 医生常常没有下班的时候。

example.ex: Automation would bring a shorter, more flexible working week.
example.tran: 自动化会使工作周缩短，也更为灵活。

entry.def: A working day is a day on which people go to work.

example.ex: The full effect will not be apparent until Tuesday, the first working day after the three day holiday weekend.
example.tran: 周二是周末3天假期后的第一个工作日，到那时效果才会完全显现出来。

entry.tran: （人生阶段）工作的，处于就业年龄的
entry.def: Your working life is the period of your life in which you have a job or are of a suitable age to have a job.

example.ex: He started his working life as a truck driver.
example.tran: 他的工作生涯是从当卡车司机开始的。

entry.tran: (某一地区的人口)就业的，处于就业年龄的
entry.def: The working population of an area consists of all the people in that area who have a job or who are of a suitable age to have a job.

example.ex: Almost 13 per cent of the working population is already unemployed.
example.tran: 就业人口中有将近13%已失业。

entry.tran: （条件或常规做法）工作的，工作上的
entry.def: Working conditions or practices are ones which you have in your job.

example.ex: The strikers are demanding higher pay and better working conditions.
example.tran: 罢工者要求加薪并改善工作环境。

entry.def: Working clothes are designed for doing work in, and are intended to be practical rather than attractive.
A working relationship is the relationship you have with someone when you work with them.

example.ex: A working relationship turned into a very close friendship...
example.tran: 同事关系变成了非常亲密的友谊。

example.ex: The vice-president seems to have a good working relationship with the president.
example.tran: 副总统似乎与总统有着良好的工作关系。

entry.tran: (农场或企业)经营性的，营利性的
entry.def: A working farm or business exists to do normal work and make a profit, and not only for tourists or as someone's hobby.

entry.tran: (机器零部件)能运转的，用于操作的
entry.def: The working parts of a machine are the parts which move and operate the machine, in contrast to the outer case or container in which they are enclosed.
A working model is one that has parts that move.
A working knowledge or majority is not very great, but is enough to be useful.

example.ex: This book was designed in order to provide a working knowledge of finance and accounts...
example.tran: 本书旨在提供金融和会计方面的实用知识。

example.ex: Neither candidate won a working majority.
example.tran: 两位候选人都没有赢得有效的多数票。

entry.def: A working title or definition is one which you use when starting to make or do something, but which you are likely to change or improve.

example.ex: His working title for the script was 'Trust the People'.
example.tran: 他给这个剧本暂定的标题是《相信人民》。

entry.tran: (设备、组织或系统的)工作方式，运行方式
entry.def: The workings of a piece of equipment, an organization, or a system are the ways in which it operates and the processes which are involved in it.

example.ex: Neural networks are computer systems which mimic the workings of the brain...
example.tran: 神经网络是模拟大脑工作方式的计算机系统。

example.ex: The bill would give people the right to much more information about the workings of government.
example.tran: 该法案将赋予人们了解更多有关政府运作方面信息的权利。

entry.def: You can use workings to refer to deep tunnels or holes which have been dug in the ground in order to remove coal, metal, or stone.

example.ex: ...housing which was built above old mine workings.
example.tran: 修建在老矿坑上的房屋

means.word_mean: 1. the internal mechanism of a device
2. a mine or quarry that is being or has been worked

auth_sentence.content: It looks like the intricate workings of a watch.
auth_sentence.res_content: It looks like the intricate workings of a watch.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It looks like the intricate workings of a watch.

auth_sentence.content: Science studies the natural world desiring to understand its workings.
auth_sentence.res_content: Science studies the natural world desiring to understand its workings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Science studies the natural world desiring to understand its workings.

auth_sentence.content: Critics say his absence adversely affects the workings of government.
auth_sentence.res_content: Critics say his absence adversely affects the workings of government.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Critics say his absence adversely affects the workings of government.
